sentences.english: My laundry is not ready yet.
sentences.chinese: 我送洗的衣物尚未洗好。

sentences.english: Clothing saturated with oxygen is readily ignitable and will burn vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 吸饱了氧的衣物很容易点燃，而且燃烧剧烈。

sentences.english: Some clothes are not the advisability of using either washing machines wash, or it will lose.
sentences.chinese: 有些衣物则不宜用洗衣机洗涤，否则将得不偿失。

sentences.english: The hair beautification comb which is convenient to carry does not easily pollute skin or clothing.
sentences.chinese: 该发梳携带方便，不污染皮肤或衣物。

sentences.english: And your clothes should feel just as fluffy with only a quarter of a dryer sheet.
sentences.chinese: 只用四分之一的防静电布一样可以使你的衣物蓬松。
衣物防窃安全管理应用。

sentences.english: Unit 19 My laundry is not ready yet?
sentences.chinese: 我送洗的衣物尚未洗好吗？

sentences.english: Efficient without a good soak decontamination vigorously scrub, do not hurt the clothing does not hurt the hand.
sentences.chinese: 高效好泡去污无需大力搓洗，不伤衣物不伤手。

sentences.english: Do not use fabric softener. Wash dark colours separately.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用柔顺剂洗涤，与浅色衣物分开洗涤。
在衣物烘干机中找到钱。

sentences.english: The neater you pack them the more you can carry.
sentences.chinese: 你摆放得越整齐，能装进去的衣物就越多。

sentences.english: Use the straps inside the bag to prevent the clothes from moving.
sentences.chinese: 那就借助包里的带子来阻止衣物移动吧。

sentences.english: This is an interesting execution for fabric conditioner from Australia.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个来自澳大利亚的有趣的衣物柔顺剂广告。

sentences.english: Some laundries can't be washed due to the cloth materials.
sentences.chinese: 也有因布料原因而不能进行洗涤的衣物。

sentences.english: Two sets of protective clothing with gloves and helmet shall be provided.
sentences.chinese: 须备有兩套保护衣物，連同手套以及头盔。

sentences.english: Target has maintained its reputation for stylish clothes at low prices.
sentences.chinese: 塔吉特已经在时尚衣物的低价格方面保持着声誉。
